displayed_text: Patient: Yeah, right. Family Member: Yeah. Doctor: And so those are all issues that you’ve got to sort out. Family Member: Yeah. Doctor: How do you know it’s working? Family Member: I think that we should probably wait until catheter is out. Patient: Right, that’s what I was thinking originally, Family Member: And see what happens with medication. Patient: Yeah. Family Member: Um, now about the uh hormone shots. So he’s covered for three months. After that expires he should get another shot and you start chemo? Doctor: He will have another shot, so it should be in here already. I will put it in. Family Member: In January.
